Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt

MIWT is a web toolkit for rapidly building user interfaces.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    The Action interface provides a useful extension to the ActionListener interface in cases where the same functionality may be accessed by several controls.
    ActionDefinition
    Action definition.
    History
    Implements a History list.
    Pageable
    This interface should be implemented by components that support paging, ie the ability to view a component a page at a time.
    WindowScrollCallback
    Window scrolling callback.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAction
    This class provides default implementations for the Action interface.
    ActionFactory
    Factory for creating action based objects.
    ActionFactoryImpl
    ActionFactory implementation.
    ButtonGroup
    This class is used to create a multiple-exclusion scope for a set of buttons.
    Color
    Represents a color.
    ColorEditor
    Editor for Color.
    DelegatingAction
    Action that delegates to another action.
    DelegatingHistory
    History delegate.
    Device
    The device class abstracts device characters that the WindowManager is using for display.
    HistoryElement
    HistoryElement instances are used to populate a History object to hold the history of Components.
    HistoryImpl
    Implements a History list.
    HTMLRenderContext
    The context used when rendering HTML.
    Image
    Represents an image.
    MIWTApplication
    Class that all MIWT applications must extend.
    MIWTSession
    An MIWTSession object holds the necessary objects to support running a set of applications for a single user's session.
    MonitorDevice
    Device model of a monitor whose dimensions are defined by pixels and there is a DPI.
    ReflectiveAction
    Action implementation that takes an Object and method name to call when the Action is fired.
    StateEventAction
    An action to fire a state event.
    Timer
    A Timer object calls tasks to be executed at a specified time and/or interval.
    WindowManager
    The WindowManager manages the presentation, medium and event dispatch layers for one session of any number of MIWT applications.
    WindowScrollCallbackImpl
    Constructor.
    WindowUpdateContext
    Context information for a Window update operation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Type safe enumeration of directions using compass directions as names.
    HorizontalJustification
    Type-safe enumeration describing horizontal justification.
    ImageFill
    Type safe enumeration for image fill methods.
    Orientation
    Type-safe enumeration for orientation, horizontal or vertical.
    WindowScrollPosition
    Scroll position.
    WindowUpdateInitiator
    Initiator of a window update.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CannotCloseMIWTException
    Exception thrown when trying to close a Component when it cannot be closed.
    MIWTException
    Base exception for MIWT exceptions.

Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt Description

MIWT is a web toolkit for rapidly building user interfaces.
